mapper.update: update bbs set usersid=#{usersid} , title=#{title} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} , repnum=#{repnum} where bbsid=#{bbsid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , b.image from bbs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid order by bbsid desc
select a.* , b.username , b.image from bbs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid and bbsid=#{bbsid} order by bbsid desc

select a.* , b.username , b.image from bbs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid
